game.name: Dragon City
game.description:
Dragons look very fierce and scary. These creatures do not want to see other things in their areas. Today we will take you to a world where you have to control a lovely dragon in Dragon City game. Is not pretty exciting to play the role of a dragon? These dragons are very smart to fly in the sky or walk on road. However, they only need your quick guidance to survive in the present world. We hope that you join this fun-filled dragon flying game and help these creatures to make their adventure memorable forever. 
Build a dragon city where no other creatures and things exist except these fire-breathing dragons! It sounds easy to handle such a situation, but many uninvited obstacles will be on your way when you join their world. Kill soldiers, and bike riders or anyone else you see moving through your fire! Do not allow any vehicles to run on the road! Reach to a high-sky building and watch the entire city from the top to find your next target to shoot in this one of the highly addictive flying games!
Your main objective is to finish all living things and become a top dragon master in the world.  Play like a champion, and collect as coins as possible to unlock new multiple dragon skins! It will be amazing to witness various types of fireball fire breath and melee attack in this 3D dragon simulator.  Enjoy the lovely city simulation with tons of soldiers and cars! Good luck to control an adorable dragon in your own style in our free top dragon simulation games where no download required.
